hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
